name: Flurp's Diner- | Official Game (v 1.0) [IN-BROWSER VER.]
description:
GAME MADE IN SCRATCH

For the best experience, wear headphones. Be cautious, though, for this project is very loud.

Here it is, the browser version of Flurp's Diner.

Synopsis:

Your name is Andrew. You have just been hired as the Night Watchman for a place called Flurp's Diner, a diner based off the popular kids television series titled "Flurp's Funland". Soon, you realize the animatronics in this building are not what they seem. As they slowly close in on you, you have to decide whether to let them in or not.

Controls and Survival Tips:

Mouse to move around and stuff.

Click the arrows that show up to turn and move.

Hover your mouse over the gray bar to open cameras.

Flurp the Pink Flamingo and Billy the Brown Bat will make their way to the door on your right. Billy moves a lot faster than Flurp, but takes a while to come out.

Daffodil the Yellow Duck will make her way into the vent in front of you. She will make a loud banging noise, signaling her location. Use your flashlight to send her back.

Hanger the Janitorial Robot is in the Broom Closet on your left. He will slowly move towards you. Use your flashlight to send him back.

Be careful, your door can only stay shut for so long.

With all that said, have fun at your new job here at Flurp's Diner!

Credits:

Warning Music - FNAF 1

Title Music - Youtube Video

Inspiration - Scott Cawthon, Creator of FNAF

"It's Flup!" Poster - @mrLostOne on Scratch

Door slam sound - Emil Macko, Creator of FNAC

Jumpscare Sound - Jollibee's Phase 2

Hanger's Jumpscare Sound - Nightmare's Jumpscare

6 AM - Me, using BeepBox

Ending - Me, once again using BeepBox

Other sounds - Various Sources
